Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory89.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The base is just an hour of snowmobile ride away. It is surrounded by a wall fortified with cannons, with warships docked offshore.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "...Quite the reinforcements, Babylonia! They're all wounded!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After dismounting the snowmobile and entering the base, you see a disgruntled man accompanied by guards blocking the way.'}
{3: 'Looks like all of the rescued soldiers were settled here.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: "They just need some minor treatment before returning to battle. We're built different!", 4: '2'}
{3: "As if unable to detect the man's dissatisfaction, Atiel explains in her usual bubbliness."}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Anyway, enough about that. I brought the last commandant over. Our forces are all here now.', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "The boss you've been talking about, eh...? Must be the one behind... Ah!", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Y-you're... Rosetta... Why are you here?!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man panics at the sight of Rosetta. He takes a few uncontrollable steps back, but realizing that he is in public, he forces his legs to a halt.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's been a while, Captain.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Rosetta's expression is unreadable. She merely follows with a light sigh."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Commandant, this is Captain Staessen of the Arctic Route Union. He was the one who requested reinforcements.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hello, Captain.', 3: '17', 4: 'Between you and Rosetta...', 5: '18'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'Ahem... Hello... You must be 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "Not with Rosetta, the Forest Guard... There's no way I could be as calm and collected as you when facing those sinners.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: "Well, now that we've got the self introductions over. Captain, Could you give a sitrep to our boss?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: "Alright... I don't know how much Rosetta has told you, but I'll give you the run down from the beginning.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "The ARU is on the verge of collapse. We've treated this tide too lightly.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'On the verge of collapse... How could this go belly up so quickly?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "Pah, isn't that obvious? All because the Forest Guards can't hold the line.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "The bionics blitzed the shore, then captured our warehouse and energy pipeline. It'll be our death sentence if we continue to go on without supplies.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: 'The worst part is not knowing where the bionics came from. Correct?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Where did the bionics come from?', 3: '27', 4: 'How long has it been going on?', 5: '28'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "I don't know... Who knows why the bionics are suddenly appearing in droves?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'Two months...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "You mean you've kept this in the dark for two months... You waited until the last minute to inform Babylonia. Is that right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'You over there, bring me the map!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Staessen orders another guard to activate the projection terminal. The entire Arctic Route Union and its surrounding terrain manifest as a holographic map.'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "See the circles on the map? Those are the regions taken by the bionics. We need Babylonia's help in recovering them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'Enemies are sure to be in greater number there. Likely at least 60 bionic units per region.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "I'm not trained for combat, so I'm not much use to you out in the field.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Speaking of... Where are Diana and the others?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'The Forest Guards are out conducting guerrilla warfare. We decided on this tactical direction during our last meeting.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Finally recovering from his motion sickness, Simon indicates several of the Forest Guard's patrol routes on the map."}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "I'm sure Captain Staessen has brought you up to speed now, Boss. Why don't we split up?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'A squad each?', 3: '40', 4: "We're not going together?", 5: '41'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Yeah. The occupied areas are interconnected. Even if we retake part of the pipelines, it would be pointless without all of them recovered.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "We won't cover as much ground together. Considering we're not up against the Corrupted, splitting up seems like our best bet.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I see... An astute command. You speak just like a commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Um... Well, I am a commandant, Rosetta.', 4: '2'}
{3: "The suddenly dependable Simon rouses Rosetta's suspicions. After all, he was doubled over with motion sickness when they first met."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: "Simon might not look all that reliable, but his tactical decisions are on-point! Well, it's decided then. We'll take the right. You guys take the left.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "Let's recover the territory ASAP and restore peace to the ARU!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Seems doable, but before that, I need to make preparations for you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What preparations?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'You need protection.', 4: '1'}
